metadata.title: CVE-2024-36959 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pinctrl: devicetree: fix refcount leak in pinctrl_dt_to_map()If we fail to allocate propname buffer, we need to drop the referencecount we just took. Because the pinctrl_dt_free_maps() includes thedroping operation, here we call it directly.

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
